description: 共同科英文（一）課程為一學年課程，每學期兩學分，係為非英語系學生所開設的課程。目標在幫助大一學生活用中學時期所累積的英語知識，提昇英語聽、說、讀、寫整體的溝通能力。為達此目標，本課程要求教師盡量用英語上課，努力營造一個豐富的英語環境，讓學生不但有充分機會以英語參與課堂活動，且樂於使用英語與同學及老師溝通。
goals: 增進學生英語溝通表達能力
透過參與課程活動促進團隊精神
透過多面向英語閱讀促使學生了解多元文化，拓展學生國際化視野
透過課堂討論培養批判精神
提升學生英語學習動機及自主學習興趣

**Course Objectives**  
The course is designed to help students develop their English skills. The aim of this course is thus multifold: to enhance students’ English reading comprehension, to increase their vocabulary by looking at how a given word is used in multiple contexts, and to improve their critical thinking skills through thought-provoking texts. Thus, the selected materials cover a wide variety of topics in _Reading Explorer 2_: food, culture, animals, music, etc.. In this semester, students are expected to attend classes regularly, to hand in homework punctually, and to participate actively in class discussion. Any copy-and-paste content is prohibited in homework and group presentations.   
 

**Delivery of Instruction**  
Lecture, group discussion (Quality Talk), and individual presentation 

  
**Course Requirements and Grading**

1\. Attendance and Class Participation (25%)  
In this semester, students have to attend classes regularly and to prepare for class discussion guided through the assigned texts. The course simultaneously encourages them to respond critically to questions raised by the texts. The attendance policy allows them to take a leave TWICE without penalty only in a situation where they send a formal absence e-mail to me. HOWEVER, absence from **THREE** classes will affect your grade on this part (raw score\* 0.8). **Students absent from FOUR classes will fail the course.** Late arrival (arriving 15 minutes late to class) counts as absence. **Please note that students are required to turn their cameras on in online meetings.** 

2\. Reading or Listening Quizzes (15%)  
Details will be further announced and discussed in the first meeting.

3. Self-introduction  (25%)  
Details will be further announced and discussed in the first meeting.

4\. Final Exam (25%)  
The final exam is tentatively scheduled for 7 Jan 2022. The format of the exam will be announced a week prior to the exam date.
